==Trivia==
* {{Transclude|Joy of Returning|JoyTheme|section=1}}
* The Chinese name of the track, {{Zh|暧暧含光|Ài'ài Hán Guāng|A Dusky Light}}, may be a reference to a line from the poem {{Zh|座右铭|Zuòyòumíng|Motto}} by the Han dynasty poet {{w|Cui Han}}. The relevant line reads, {{Zh|在涅贵不淄，暧暧内含光|Zài niè guì bù zī, ài'ài nèi hán guāng|Noble and unsullied even in blackened mud, within the duskiness is a light}}.
